reviews.text: Diner was delicious , and Mansur was the best !!!! Highly recommended!!
Me and my girls really enjoyed our ramen meal.  We‚Äôve had ramen all over the city and this was on the top.  Loved it.

J'ai pris les nouilles tha√Ø vegan. Un des meilleurs plats que j'ai jamais mang√©!
J'ai parfaitement retouv√© le gout des plats que j'aimais tant lors de mon voyage en Tha√Øland, depuis le temps que je cherchais un restaurant comme celui-ci, me voil√† satisfait! De plus, les serveurs sont tr√®s agr√©ables!
J'y suis d√©j√† retourn√© une fois et vais s√ªrement y retourner encore!
A-MA-ZING. Thanks guys for still being in business for so many years. This has been my husband and my favorite spot.
Food was amazing and Ricky is amazing!

My father and I absolutely adore this restaurant. Food and service is always amazing and we‚Äôre always excited to come and get lunch! Monsur always provides excellent service whenever we come in! We absolutely recommend Jin Ramen 125th!

Jin Ramen is by far my favorite Ramen shop. Our server Monsur was attentive and very polite. I live in Orange County but anytime my daughter and I come into the City we stop. We absolutely love Jin Ramen 125th.
Ramen was really salty
Great ramen!  Monsur was great.  Excellent service!
First time at this restaurant and definitely will come back. Marcos was exceptional super attentive!  Awesome service ! Awesome food ! Definitely recommend this place !!!
Tremendous variety of food. It came out pretty quickly with good quality. Our waiter Jason was very courteous, knowledgeable and familiar with the menu.
the city pop music was great atmosphere for a saturday night. the chicharr√≥n ramen is heavenly good, like seriously the best item on the menu. and server Monsur was so kind and professional
Incredible food, fantastic service. Ask for the special mexican ramens if you want a change. Monsur was my server and he was attentive and prompt!
Delicious food and great service by Monsur. If they have the chicharron ramen, you should try that gem.
Monsur was great and the Food too! The Beer cold and the ramen on point

Can‚Äôt even explain how amazing my experience was here, the service was incredible,our server was always checking on us and willing to give recommendations. They have two different areas for dining,I thought it was only one area for dining,but they have more tables on the other side,portions were pretty good,they also have a lunch special menu,definitely coming back here!
Carlos was an amazing server who shared his expertise with us!

Monsur was a great server for us tonight! I got the Miso Ramen and the Nanban Chicken Appetizer, both were delicious!! My family got ramen and a ton of the appetizers which all tasted fresh and distinguished from other places I have been to. Great food all around! Thank you!
Food was great and amazing service from our server, Monsor!  Looking forward to our next visit.

Horrible experience all their options is spicy ‚ÄúRamen‚ÄùThey have nothing that is non spicy so if you have a low spicy tolerant, I don‚Äôt recommend this place. The Ramen was disgustingly bland . No taste whatsoever really bad experience unfortunately the only thing that was really tasty and good was the dumplings, but you cannot go wrong with dumping
Great service and excellent ramen. Monsur and Ricky deliver consistent and quality service.

this is one of our family's top neighborhood spots, a true gem uptown. great ramen that we keep coming back for due to food quality as well as our fantastic friend Monsur who goes above and beyond to accommodate us every time (2-3 babies and all). we will keep coming back and warmly recommend this spot to anyone looking for cozy ramen
Ricky and Monsur were super friendly waitstaff! food and service was amazing :)
One of my favorite ramen places in NYC
Our server Monsur was amazing. Made sure we were good and went above and beyond. Monsur you're great!

Jin Ramen back at it again with good vibes and delicious food. Monsur was my server and he was wonderful as always - I‚Äôve known him for over three years and always he is warm and inviting. A wonderful establishment with wonderful staff!
Had an amazing time here. Food was awesome. Monsur was amazing to us the entire time and took great care of us. I‚Äôll definitely be back!
Monsur was great!
Vegetable miso ramen soothes my soul. ‚ù§Ô∏è
Always delicious!
Very cute decor, very professional friendly service, delicate appetizers, no rush service
Food, vibes, and Ricky was amazing!
Have been coming here for a while and am never let down. Huge thanks to Ricky for the stellar and quick service.
Portions are pretty small. Not enough ramen, exactly 2 slices of pork, mainly a variety of vegetables was the only thing they were more generous with.
forever favorite spot! great food with a large variety of options including vegan and vegetarian options. lots of locations have opened over the years which makes it a great accessible option!

I‚Äôve been a long time patron and the food, service and atmosphere is fantastic. I happily recommend to all of my friends and family.  Mansor, like all the folks who work here, are fantastic and really make sure i have a great experience. My go to is the spicy tonkatsu ramen but the entire menu is solid.

Pedi el kuro tonkotsu  y estaba muy bueno la verdad, porci√≥n apropiada, precio normal para el promedio en NY y atencion muy buena y amable por parte de un chico llamado Richy el cual creo que era el unico que hablaba espa√±ol.

100% recomendado si estas por ahi y tienes ganas de un ramen o simplemente sentarte a platicar con alquien.
Muy amable el joven Ricky.

Delicious spot, especially convenient for folks in West or Central Harlem, and right by the 125th St 1 train stop. I had the spicy tonkotsu ramen and a side of karaage, both of which were excellent. The ramen serving was generous in a rather large bowl. The chashu slices were very tender and a good thickness, and had a delicious sweet glaze on them. The broth was rich and the meal was filling without needing to order more noodles. Not cheap but not too expensive either, especially considering the high quality. I‚Äôm definitely planning to go back and try some other options. My food was served quickly after ordering, but I felt like the service after that wasn‚Äôt particularly attentive - no waiter checked in after I got my food, and I had to wait around for a while after finishing before I could get the check. Not a huge deal though, and the servers were still polite and the food was excellent.
Thank you Carlos for your attentive service and delicious recommendations.

Extremely friendly staff, wonderful food worth the price. Warm and inviting atmosphere. Jason's a great server, loved joking along with us as we asked questions about the menu so they could accommodate food allergies.
Food is good, atmosphere is great. Mansor thanks for the service. Delicious ramen and fresh drinks! Kudos!

Ricky and Monsor were incredibly attentive, friendly and strived to make my brother's birthday feel special. They even put on a fun birthday playlist as they brought his cake out. Would recommend to anyone, regardless of the occasion!

The food is so good, plus the workers are really nice

Shoutout to Monsur our server üî•üî•üî•
And Ricky ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π
Got the Karaage Don, it was delicious. Monsur was our waiter, he was great!
Monsur is so frinedly! So delicious Japanese food!
This is one of our favorite neighborhood spots. Great ramen, and even better service, we love Monsur who has been serving us at the restaurant a long time and is the main reason we keep coming back!
Food was yummerz national delicious Ricky was a great server as well!!!!
Tonkotsu (spicy or original) ramen and karaage were delicious!
The Japanese Curry Ramen and the pork buns are delicious! Jason was so nice and incredibly helpful!

Service and food is great. The Chef Jefferson in the red hat is always very friendly and awesome in cooking. Monsur is very good in customer service and quick to server. Must come if you want to travel to Japan just for authentic ramen

Our server, Ricky, was wonderful! Super attentive, and fast service.
Ramen itself was decent. Noodles cooked well. Taste was ok. Not much chicken flavor in my broth. But overall, satisfactory

Always come to this location. Most of the time I have the same Server. Ricky is always in a great mood and knows how to speak to the people. Always makes me feel at home. He recommended a new bowl Ramen which was very delicious. I usually get the Tonkotsu ramen but this time I tried the NEW Chicken encebollado Ramen. Great taste and reminds me of a homemade dish my grandmother makes. This place never disappoints.
Chicken encebollado ramen and Tonkotsu ramen.

An amazing spot in the city, it‚Äôs cozy and the service is great. I‚Äôll visit again when I‚Äôm back from Dominican Republic.

Carlos was really nice and welcoming. Kudos to the team who didn‚Äôt make us wait for the food that was incredibly good.
Loved both ramen and fried rice. Fried rice seemed to be based on butter + soy sauce, and that‚Äôs my fav flavor base for fried rice so can‚Äôt complain at all.‚Ä¶
The food was incredible! I had the eggplant and ginger soba noodles. It was amazing! Our server Carlos was so funny and nice. Will definitely come back again :)

Came here with my friend for our annual ramen date-- a little tradition we unintentionally started a few years ago. The space is small but can has many small tables and the ambiance is cool with dim lighting and different photos and even action figure pieces on the walls. We got the veggie gyozas and karaage to start which left a lot to be desired, to put it simply the food lacked flavor :/ as our time there went on and we waited for our main dish, ramen, our waiter barely attended us and we had to flag him down several times to ask for more water, napkins and drinks. Even when my friend returned her drink bc she didn't like it after just one sip, the waiter rolled his eyes and gave us such a deep sigh, we found the interaction very rude as if we had insulted him directly. Finally our ramen came out. I got the shrimp ramen and my friend the chicharron ramen. It was much more flavorful than the appetizers but nothing very special. The consensus: we've had better elsewhere. I wouldn't highly recommend this place considering the service was significantly lacking and the food was mid at best....
Delicious authentic ramen experience! Juan was a great host and was able to walk us through the menu and go over all of the many options. Will definitely be back!

I first visited this restaurant 10 years ago, and the taste and aroma of their dumplings stayed with me ever since. After a decade, I just had to come back ‚Äî and I was absolutely blown away! The restaurant has grown and improved so much, yet it still keeps that authentic charm and quality I remembered. The food is simply perfect, and the service is outstanding. Highly recommended for anyone looking for an unforgettable dining experience!

We love Jin Ramen! Great food and services. We have been here for many times and Jason, our amazing server, has always been so welcoming and making our dining experience great. We have two young children and Jason was very understanding and considerate, providing extra napkins and what we needed. Will definitely come back.
Very solid ramen!! huge selection of options including other japanese dishes. Our server Monsur was great and attentive. Definitely the better ramen spot in the area

Both of us were unfamiliar with West Harlem and we ended up coming to Jin Ramen, a ramen spot recommended in Michelin Bib Gourmand.

They have an extensive menu with all types of ramen and brothless ramen.   Overall it‚Äôs a good ramen spot and worth a try if you‚Äôre near one of their three locations in the city.

The kuro tonkotsu features a rich broth packed with black garlic oil aroma. The grilled cha shu was smoky and perfectly glazed with sweet sauce. The soft-boiled egg was cooked to perfection. They used thin noodles which held the soup pretty well.

My friend ordered their signature spicy tonkotsu. The broth was quite spicy in Japanese food standard, but not overbearing. A nice option if you want to spice up your ramen.

You can get a complimentary yuzu drink if you order an entree. It was so refreshing for this weather and cleansed our palate after the meal.

This spot is my generally go to spot for getting something warm, filling and delicious. I couldn't be more pleased with the attentiveness and outstanding hospitality amongst the servers and chefs at Jin.

A very special shout out to Monsur who took my order and gave such a  great service. There no way I wouldn't keep coming back. Its the most reliable local spot near me.

Jin you have a stand for life! <3
--------------------------------------------------
At my thousandths visit at Jin, want to give another shout out to Monsur, Ricky and the chefs today Hassen and Jefferson, for not only making exquisite, tasty, appetizers. But for always consistently providing the highest tier of hospitality.  I'm consistently greeted at the door, can always find a spot to sit, and am always provided with complentary water even before I sit.

I cannot emphasize how top notch Jin Ramen WH is, it will forever be a second home, with a extended family feel.

If you ever get a chance, please spot by and give it a shot. I promise you will not be disappointed but never wanting to leave.

PS. Giving our my own Michelin Star to my Jin Fam.
vibes were great servers were nice food not bad either pretty solid like maybe not japanese run but id go again

Absolutely the best ramen in Uptown Manhattan, and undoubtedly one of the top 3 ramen spots in NYC! I've visited Jin Ramen several times, and it's always a fantastic experience. Today, I had the vegetarian ramen with miso stock, and it was absolutely delicious‚Äîfresh, perfectly seasoned, and an excellent choice for a New Year's Eve lunch. Jason was an amazing host‚Äîsuper sweet, helpful, and an all-around great server. Highly recommend!

This is a very popular spot among students at Columbia so we decided to go. I had already heard a lot about this place, and was not disappointed. We were able to get a table easily. They had a huge menu with a lot of options, including vegetarian options. We really enjoyed the chicken gyoza, the chicken bao buns and the chicken ramen. The servers were very sweet and it‚Äôs reasonably priced. Would recommend coming here for sure.

Solid.

Salmon app stayed crispy during delivery.

Ramen also delivered well.

The beef rice bowl was the star. Superior in taste and great value. Fed two of us.

Overall, I‚Äôd order again.
Good place to grab foods and chill for a while. Good atmosphere, good service given by Monsur. Authentic Japanese foods that you could find in the neighborhood. Highly recommend it.

We ordered Shoyu Ramen and Kuro Shio. Both ramen too salty. I recommend karage Soba and Tuna Yukke Don Great portion and tasty. The pork bun is good. I don‚Äôt  think it‚Äôs worth going again but there aren‚Äôt many choices around Columbia university.

Been coming here for a few years and they never disappoint! Food tastes authentic, service is great. I‚Äôve ordered a variety of items throughout the menu and have never been disappointed with any dish.

Great place for a solo lunch !

been my go to spot for years. i usually go for their lunch specials before 3pm. their pork buns are addictive, their spicy tonkotsu is my comfort food and their service is always on point. my guy Jason is always welcoming and basically knows what i want before i order it. 10/10
Amazing food, great service, fun atmosphere, & good music.
The lunch special was perfect! Takoyaki + ramen = winning combo! Glad we found this place on our visit to üóΩ!

I had a mixed experience.
The first time I went it was amazing. The food came quickly even though it was crowded and it was amazing. I regretted not switching my noodle type to curly because it looked more like traditional ramen where as my flat noodles seemed more like flattened udon. But the black garlic oil was really good, and even the salad exceeded my expectations.
The second time I went though, it took a long time for my curry udon to come, and when it did, it was only average. The katsu on it was stringy and hard to chew in places. The Karaage was super good though.
I'm still going to go again though. I think the experience you have at this restaurant depends a lot on what you order and whose working at the time.

Service was quick and efficient, they have lunch prices which helps the wallet a little bit. I got the pork baos and they were way over sauced, the sweet sauce overwhelmed the rest of the flavors. As for the tonkotsu ramen, it was very oily and not very flavorful. The noodles were too Al dente for my liking, I like it to be a bit softer.
great food and service! Jason the server was great as well:)

Restaurant ouvert jusqu'√† 22h (rare √† NY).
Grand choix de plats, tr√®s bon Ramen.

Friendly and knowledgeable staff that answered all of our questions and provided recommendations. The table primarily got tonkotsu ramen and the broth was extremely salty which made the dinner not so great

Came here today and the food was so good! I've had a lot of mid ramen but this place was on point. The sale flight hit. The service was also so great. Monsun and Ricky were very attentive and excellent!

Everytime I come to this location I am always satisfied with my food and experience. My waiter Ricky was very attentive and kind. Jin Ramen will always be my go to ramen spot ü´∂üèΩ 10/10 service, food and experience ‚ù§Ô∏è
